attachments.text: Pixate empowers you to create sophisticated animations and interactions that come to life on 100% real, native iOS and Android prototypes.
attachments.fallback: Pixate empowers you to create sophisticated animations and interactions that come to life on 100% real, native iOS and Android prototypes.

text: I loved it when I tried the trial version.
i'm excited to try it out

There were a few things that I found inconvenient, but with the concise control it gives you I felt it was a great tool. The layer based model was really great, you can assign common interaction gestures to assets and quickly mock up an app that's very close to an end product.
Oh boy, looks like they're gearing up for Photoshop connection features. That's awesome.
Also, <@U0260V1BX>, a little later I can show you the quick prototype I made for the WattUp app on my phone with Pixate.
Just so you can see it in action before you dive all the way in.
